name: Microsoft Teams Outbound Connector
description: Create, update, and send a message to your Microsoft Teams

properties.label: Type
properties.description: Authentication type depends on your MS Teams account permission and operation with connector. See connector documentation

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: The client ID of the application

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: The tenant ID of the application

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: The secret value of the Azure AD application

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: The client ID of the application

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: The tenant ID of the application

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: The secret value of the Azure AD application; optional, depends on whether the client is public or private

properties.label: Chat type
properties.description: The type of a new chat

properties.label: Members
properties.description: Set array members of chat. Learn more about the required format

properties.label: Expand response
properties.description: Choose expand type. Learn more about expanding chat response

properties.label: Content type
properties.description: The type of the content. Possible values are text and html

properties.label: Top
properties.description: Controls the number of items per response. Maximum allowed $top value is 50

properties.label: Filter
properties.description: Sets the date range filter for the lastModifiedDateTime and createdDateTime properties. Learn more about filtering

properties.label: Owner
properties.description: Enter ID or principal name of a user

properties.label: Filter
properties.description: Sets the search filter. Learn more about filtering

properties.label: Content type
properties.description: The type of the content. Possible values are text and html

properties.label: Top
properties.description: Controls the number of items per response

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
